
{{alias}}( shape )
    Returns a zero-filled four-dimensional nested array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    shape: Array<integer>
        Array shape.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( [ 1, 1, 1, 3 ] )
    [ [ [ [ 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ] ] ] ]

    See Also
    --------
